abstract: Tyler Kepner On Baseball column notes that Philadelphia Phillies fans cheered for pitcher Cliff Lee after team's playoff loss to St Louis Cardinals despite struggles he faced on the mound.
snippet: Cliff Lee has grown popular among the fans in Philadelphia, and not just because he is one of baseball’s top pitchers.
lead_paragraph: Cliff Lee has grown popular among the fans in Philadelphia, and not just because he is one of baseball’s top pitchers.

headline.main: Easygoing Lee Finds a Forgiving Home
headline.print_headline: Easygoing Lee Finds a Forgiving Home
headline.seo: Easygoing Lee Finds Home in Gentler Philadelphia
